title: Daughter of the Red Isle
description: Daughter of the Red Isle is the story of Lexington, a homeless young woman in Salem, Massachusetts, and the tragedy that spurred her journey to find family. Stranded by her mother’s sudden death, Lexi travels New England, searching for her long-lost grandparents, seeking only to inform them of their daughter’s death. Instead, she finds more family than she had bargained for, in her aunt, uncle and cousin.Leonard was a young man who seemingly had everything, until an accident took away the love of his life. He was ready to give it all up, until Lexi came into his life. Now filled with purpose, Leo is determined to make up for all his past wrongs by taking care of his cousin.Filled with poignant scenes and vivid detail of the New England coast, romance and laugh-out-loud scenes, Daughter of the Red Isle is sure to please readers of all ages. Marissa Brim’s promising debut novel is a delightful page-turner that will keep you riveted until the last word.
author: Marissa Brim
